name: NSSearchFieldDelegate
desc: A protocol that a search field delegate can use to determine when a search started or ended.

items.name: func searchFieldDidStartSearching(NSSearchField)
items.desc: The method that is called when the search field begins searching for content.

items.name: func searchFieldDidEndSearching(NSSearchField)
items.desc: The method that is called when the search field has ended its search for content.
